bookList.author: Lois McMaster Bujold
bookList.title: The Curse of Chalion
bookList.blurb: A pantheon of five gods who interact with mortals in mysterious ways. A broken hero, a curse, and a spirited young princess.

bookList.author: Philip K. Dick
bookList.title: Clans of the Alphane Moon
bookList.blurb: Psychiatric patients form a peaceful society on an abandoned moon. Also, a really nice telepathic slime mould.

bookList.author: Greg Egan
bookList.title: Diaspora
bookList.blurb: Extra hard sci-fi. In the future, uploaded humans live in virtual cities, each with their own unique culture. An unforseen event causes a Diaspora...

bookList.author: Adrian Tchaikovsky
bookList.title: Children of Time
bookList.blurb: Terraforming, evolutionary uplift, the survival of humanity, the search for a new home, first contact, slower than light space travel...

bookList.author: Walter Tevis
bookList.title: Mockingbird
bookList.blurb: A dystopian future. A declining, drugged, illiterate, self absorbed population. Privacy and individualism taken to the extreme. Sad and broken robots.

bookList.author: Jeff Vandermeer
bookList.title: Annihilation
bookList.blurb: Where lies the strangling fruit that came from the hand of the sinner I shall bring forth the seeds of the dead to share with the worms that gather in the darkness...

bookList.author: Joan D. Vinge
bookList.title: The Snow Queen
bookList.series: and the Snow Queen Cycle series
bookList.blurb: An ocean planet ruled by a Queen, 150 year summers and winters, all knowing sibyls, technology from a fallen galactic empire, the price of immortality.

bookList.author: Martha Wells
bookList.title: City of Bones
bookList.blurb: Post-apocalyptic fantasy world. Arcane relics hidden in the desert ruins of mysterious forerunners. A handsome marsupial treasure hunter.

bookList.author: Gene Wolfe
bookList.title: The Shadow of the Torturer
bookList.series: and the Book of the New Sun series
bookList.blurb: Far in the incomprehensible future, on a dying Earth. A young executioner is exiled and goes on a bizarre journey.
